1441540.name: PrePaladin Wars Demo
1441540.description:
Demo contains two levels of the full game:

Game Features:
  • active ragdoll where each limb is simulated
  • arcade combat system where you have little time to attack after enemy gets vulnerable
  • medieval times
  • alternative bow weapon
  • bird-fly mode
  • fast action with a lot of enemies
  • beautiful terrain based on real GPS data
  • cinematic soundtrack by Nicolas Jeudy
